pathAssistantSteps.info:
• Use this stage if the lead does not meet qualification criteria.
  • Common reasons for disqualification in the chemical industry:
  • Outside target geography or market
  • No relevant chemical application or industrial need
  • Academic or research-only inquiry
  • Invalid or unreachable contact
  • Duplicate lead entry

• Create the lead even if some information is missing.
  • Focus on capturing available details.
  • Try to collect the following five data elements:
    • Company Name and Country
    • Contact Person Name and Email Address
    • Customer Interest/Problem and Industry Segment
    • Source (Exhibition, Web Form, LinkedIn, Personal Contact)
    • Rating (High, Medium, Low)
  • Full qualification is not required at this stage.

• Follow up to complete all five data elements.

  • Confirm contact accuracy and industry relevance.
  • Update urgency and source based on lead interaction.
  • Goal: move lead to fully qualified status.
